name: macOS Catalina 10.15.4, Security Update 2020-002 Mojave, Security Update 2020-002 High Sierra
available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Allison Husain of UC Berkeley

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Proteas of Qihoo 360 Nirvan Team

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Proteas of Qihoo 360 Nirvan Team

advisories.impact: An application may be able to use arbitrary entitlements
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Linus Henze (pinauten.de)

advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to intercept Bluetooth traffic
advisories.description: An issue existed with the use of a PRNG with low entropy. This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Jörn Tillmanns (@matedealer) and Jiska Classen (@naehrdine) of Secure Mobile Networking Lab

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to cause unexpected system termination or read kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America
Yu Wang of Didi Research America
Yu Wang of Didi Research America
Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America
Yu Wang of Didi Research America
Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

cves.credit: Jianjun Dai of Qihoo 360 Alpha Lab

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access a user's call history
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

cves.credit: Benjamin Randazzo (@____benjamin)

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Jianjun Dai of Qihoo 360 Alpha Lab

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A permissions issue existed. This issue was addressed with improved permission validation.

cves.credit: Timo Christ of Avira Operations GmbH & Co. KG

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted text message may lead to application denial of service
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

cves.credit: Aaron Perris (@aaronp613), an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, Carlos S Tech, Sam Menzies of Sam’s Lounge, Sufiyan Gouri of Lovely Professional University, India, Suleman Hasan Rathor of Arabic-Classroom.com

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Stephan Zeisberg (github.com/stze) of Security Research Labs (srlabs.de)

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to view sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Yuval Ron, Amichai Shulman and Eli Biham of Technion - Israel Institute of Technology

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Proteas

advisories.impact: A malicious application may disclose restricted memory
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Wenjian HE of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Wei Zhang of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Sharad Sinha of Indian Institute of Technology Goa, and Sanjeev Das of University of North Carolina

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Alex Plaskett of F-Secure Consulting

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Xiaolong Bai and Min (Spark) Zheng of Alibaba Inc. and Luyi Xing of Indiana University Bloomington

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to overwrite arbitrary files
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Christoph Falta

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: pattern-f (@pattern_F_) of WaCai

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Proteas of Qihoo 360 Nirvan Team

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: Multiple issues in libxml2
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: LGTM.com
found by OSS-Fuzz

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: Multiple issues in libxml2
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved size validation.

cves.credit: LGTM.com

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary javascript code execution
advisories.description: An injection issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Apple

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.3
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to overwrite arbitrary files
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: An anonymous researcher working with iDefense Labs (https://vcp.idefense.com/), HyungSeok Han (DaramG) @Theori working with TrendMicro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A user's private browsing activity may be unexpectedly saved in Screen Time
advisories.description: An issue existed in the handling of tabs displaying picture in picture video. The issue was corrected with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Andrian (@retroplasma), Marat Turaev, Marek Wawro (futurefinance.com) and Sambor Wawro of STO64 School Krakow Poland

advisories.impact: A user may gain access to protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to view sensitive user information
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher, Augusto Alvarez of Outcourse Limited

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to run commands as a non-existent user
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by updating to sudo version 1.8.31.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to trigger a sysdiagnose
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks

cves.credit: Dayton Pidhirney (@_watbulb) of Seekintoo (@seekintoo)

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted application may be able to bypass code signing enforcement
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Patrick Wardle of Jamf

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Lasse Trolle Borup of Danish Cyber Defence

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in Vim
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating to version 8.1.1850.

cves.credit: Steve Hahn of LinkedIn

advisories.impact: Some websites may not have appeared in Safari Preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Ryan Pickren (ryanpickren.com)

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack
advisories.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yiğit Can YILMAZ (@yilmazcanyigit)
